collection_holder_name: New York Public Library for the Performing Arts, Dorothy and Lewis B. Cullman Center
pageContext.collection_title: Music for the connoisseur [sound recording] : Composers--Early and late.
pageContext.collection_description: Wilhelm Kempff, piano (3rd work) ; Egon Petri, piano (4th work) ; Vienna State Opera with Vienna Philharmonic Orchestra (6th work) ; Budapest Quartet (7th work) ; New Music Quartet (8th work) ; David Randolph, host ; with unidentified radio announcer and various performers.
